level.heading: Nature, purpose, and duration of limited liability company.

level.text: A limited liability company is an entity distinct from its members.
A limited liability company may have any lawful purpose, regardless of whether for profit.
A limited liability company shall have perpetual duration.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on ยง 104 of the Uniform Limited Company Act (2006 Act). See Vol. 6B , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
